mapper.insert: insert into oc_task (id, task_name, task_type, task_stat, task_bgn_date, task_end_date, task_desc, cust_id, cust_name, oppert_id, oppert_name, contact_id, contact_name, respons_id, respons_name, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskBgnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oppertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oppertName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update oc_task set task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_stat = #{taskStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_bgn_date = #{taskBgnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_end_date = #{taskEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_desc = #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oppert_id = #{oppertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oppert_name = #{oppertName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_id = #{contactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, respons_id = #{responsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, respons_name = #{responsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, task_name, task_type, task_stat, task_bgn_date, task_end_date, task_desc, cust_id, cust_name, oppert_id, oppert_name, contact_id, contact_name, respons_id, respons_name, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_task where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, task_name, task_type, task_stat, task_bgn_date, task_end_date, task_desc, cust_id, cust_name, oppert_id, oppert_name, contact_id, contact_name, respons_id, respons_name, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_task

select id, task_name, task_type, task_stat, task_bgn_date, task_end_date, task_desc, cust_id, cust_name, oppert_id, oppert_name, contact_id, contact_name, respons_id, respons_name, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_task where 1 = 1
and task_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{taskName}),'%')
and task_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{taskType}),'%')
and task_stat like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{taskStat}),'%')
and task_bgn_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{taskBgnDate}),'%')
and task_end_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{taskEndDate}),'%')
and task_desc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{taskDesc}),'%')
and cust_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{custId}),'%')
and cust_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{custName}),'%')
and oppert_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{oppertId}),'%')
and oppert_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{oppertName}),'%')
and contact_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contactId}),'%')
and contact_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{contactName}),'%')
and respons_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{responsId}),'%')
and respons_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{responsName}),'%')
and rec_stat like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{recStat}),'%')
ORDER BY task_end_date
